title: Sci-Fi Game UI Sounds
description: An extensive collection of 202 audio files of user interface sounds, buttons, notifications, confirm and cancel, clicks and others.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/scifi-game-ui-sounds-short-preview

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7tazouphi8oua3g/MSE%20-%20Sci-Fi%20Game%20UI%20Sounds_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


Add volume to your user interface, give sound to your buttons and notifications, bring your menu actions to life when selecting, upgrading, pencil moving, page flipping, confirming, and canceling with this library of futuristic sci-fi style, containing 202 sound effects.


All sound effects are designed with different synthesizers, which means that there is no extraneous noise in them. For some sounds, additional reverb and delay processing has been used.


You can also mix sound effects with each other to create even more sound variations.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 202 sound effects
  • 44.1 kHz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • wide variety of user interface sounds
  • great for many kinds of buttons, clicks, notifications, upgrades, user interface selections and more


Number of Audio Waves: 202

Number of Audio Cues: 202

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 03 minutes 28 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
